__e: Scholarship money, a chance to see the world broaden your horizons--
You ever want to get the girl, you've got to broaden your horizons.
We wanted to see if you could expand your mind and your horizons.
I walked to the window and against the horizon I saw his long legs leaping, suitcase and trumpet in hand.

I believe that it's good for both Western men and Ukrainian women to be able to explore options elsewhere because it's always great when you can expand your horizons and understand what is right for you.
When there are bodies stretched from here to the horizon, and you can walk across them without touching the ground, then you can weep.
